product_name: Salomon Comet 3D GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: These nimble Salomon Comet 3D GTX hiking boots offer excellent stability, cushioning and waterproof protection that's well suited to day hikes and lightweight overnight trips. Sturdy and long-lasting nubuck leather and nylon mesh uppers offer flexibility, breathability and lightweight comfort; leather is waterproofed to resist stains and elements. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. External thermoplastic urethane heel slings and mid-height cut help keep feet stable; cushy foam around heels enhances comfort. Rubber toe caps help protect boots and feet from bumps and abrasion; gusseted tongues keep debris out of boots. Washable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort. Thermoplastic urethane inserts supply additional stability and support underfoot. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon Comet 3D GTX hiking boots feature an aggressive tread for all-around trail traction. Fit tip: runs true to size.
short_description: These nimble Salomon Comet 3D GTX hiking boots offer excellent stability, cushioning and waterproof protection that's well suited to day hikes and lightweight overnight trips.
